thothbot.parallax.core.shared.helpers

Class CameraHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Object3D
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.GeometryObject
        • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Line
          • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.helpers.CameraHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DimensionalObject

    public class CameraHelper
extends Line
    Shows frustum, line of sight and up of the camera.

    Based on frustum visualization in lightgl.js shadowmap example github.com

    Based on three.js code.

    Author:
    thothbot
